TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EllipseStylusShape extends System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape

Docs.summary: Represents a stylus tip shaped like an ellipse.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to create an EllipseStylusShape and pass it to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> method to erase a portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>. This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> called `eraseTester` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event has been connected to the event handler defined in this example. To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
